item.title: Chipmaker Qualcomm lays off hundreds of workers in San Diego
item.description:
This is the chipmaker's second round of layoffs over the past year, while the company recorded billions in revenue.

item.title: SpaceX disputes $633K FAA fine, citing “systematic challenges” with agency
item.description:
SpaceX sent a letter to top Congressional leaders on Wednesday denying allegations that it violated its launch licenses on two separate occasions last year, which has resulted in regulators seeking $633,009 in penalties from the company. Instead, the company asserts that the inability of the Federal Aviation Authority’s Office of Commercial Space Transportation (AST) to […]
